cause.description:
We want to show people that it is wrong to torture animals at any cause. Dog fighting for example should not be allowed and anyone who bets or encourages it should be aressted or fined. Animal cruelty is everywhere in the world and we need to stand up and put a stop to it.
1. Animal fighting be banned everywhere.
2. Torture to be stopped to animals.
3. Keep endangered animal on our planet.
cause.mission: Putting an end to animal cruelty
cause.name: Fighting Animal Cruelty
